General.Name: Direct Communication Solutions Inc
General.Description: Direct Communication Solutions, Inc. provides solutions for the Internet of Things (IoT). Its range of products include GPS devices, modems, embedded modules, routers, mobile tracking machine-to-machine (M2M) devices, communications and applications software, and cloud services. The company's M2M products and solutions enable devices to communicate with each other, and with server and cloud-based application infrastructures. It also offers Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions, including MiFleet, which offers fleet and vehicle SaaS telematics; MiSensors that provide M2M device management and service enablement for wireless sensors; MiFailover, which offers high-speed wireless internet failover services to small and medium-sized businesses; and MiCOVID CAM, an automated temperature screening solution. In addition, the company provides MiServices, a managed service that includes engineering, logistics, and wireless data services. Direct Communication Solutions, Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.
General.Address: 11021 Via Frontera, San Diego, CA, United States, 92127
